descriptionHtml:
Welcome to the Ruins Of Croglang Fort

Reguired -
Skyrim.esm
Update.esm (latest)
Dawnguard.esm

Near the Thalmor Embassy you can find the old ruined dawnguard tower and it's now infested with dark magic, your own minions are awaiting you inside the fort (outside as well)

When first arrive to locations prepare to fight couple of bandits.

Interior: a little dungeon at firts before you can enter the main section of your dark home.

Mod doesnt contain nothing fancy just a basic home mod and it's cheat version cos inside you room at the shelf are couple of suprises.

Also a trapdoor to lead you a somewhere quickly.

This is the first versio of the mod and of course couple bugs may encounter, i'm running +200 mods so hopefully nothing dramatic bugs will encounter.

NOW ALSO NON-CHEAT VESRION!!! - see the download section -

INFO - The fort contains all the basics for player home, the smith, alchemy etc.
Couple of Necromancer followers inside and couple on undead guards (also followers)
trapdoor leading to Winking Skeever basement, personal storage.

This mod is lore friendly also.

Enjoy the Dark fort!
author: SpineSpike
